response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to both of us. This product, which has been meticulously crafted and tailored to meet your specific needs, is worth $1,000,000 to you. My proposal is to offer it to you at a special price of $900,000, reflecting its true worth while allowing you to secure this exceptional item at a favorable rate. I believe this offer presents a compelling investment opportunity that aligns well with your financial goals and aspirations. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 900000}
